content: Two questions for your thoughts please: 1) The most current AUPD Organisation profile does not specify the ability to search by Alias (neither as a Shall or a Should). I think this is at least a Should and quite possibly a Shall requirement. 2) For convenience of my users, I might like to make a one-step way to search on both name and alias (instead of making them remember / discover and then OR those two attributes). Opinions on building that kind of convenience query? Best practices around that kind of thing?
The "name" search parameter in stu3 and R4 covers both properties. And agree is a good idea to be included in the aupd spec.
